feed.title: Google Cloud: Looker Studio
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Looker Studio

entry.content:
Pro feature: CSV connector enhancement

Introducing new user experience enhancements for the CSV connector.

Learn more about the CSV connector.

Note: This feature is being released gradually. You might not see it right away.
entry.summary: We've enhanced the user experience for the CSV connector. Learn more about the CSV connector here: https://cloud.google.com/looker/docs/studio/upload-csv-files-to-looker-studio. Please note that this feature is being released gradually, so you may not see it immediately.
entry.title: Feature: CSV connector user experience enhancements

entry.content:
Partner connection launch update

The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • Spotify Ads by Dataslayer. Sources: Spotify Ads Studio
  • Amazon Ads by Dataslayer. Sources: Amazon Ads
  • Zoho by Dataslayer. Sources: Zoho CRM
  • Lazada Commerce by Supermetrics. Sources: Supermetrics
  • Google Sheets by Porter Metrics. Sources: Google Drive
  • OWOX Data Marts by OWOX. Sources: Owox Data Mart
  • Close CRM by Supermetrics. Sources: Close
  • Centra by Supermetrics. Sources: Centra
  • BMS Monitoring by BMS. Sources: BMS
  • Vibe by Supermetrics. Sources: Vibe
  • Power My Analytics by Power My Analytics. Sources: Constant Contact
  • Zen AI - Meta Ads by Zen AI. Sources: Facebook Ads
entry.summary: We're excited to announce the addition of several new partner connectors to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery. These new connectors allow you to integrate data from Spotify Ads, Amazon Ads, Zoho, Lazada Commerce, Google Sheets, OWOX Data Marts, Close CRM, Centra, BMS Monitoring, Vibe, Power My Analytics, and Zen AI - Meta Ads.
entry.title: Feature: New Connectors Available

entry.content:
Pro feature: Share and schedule reports with Slack

You can now send Looker Studio reports to Slack channels and Slack users on your Slack workspaces. This feature is only available to Looker Studio Pro users, and is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Looker Studio Pro users can now share and schedule reports directly within Slack. This new feature is available in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Share and schedule reports in Slack

entry.content:
Vertical stacking in responsive reports

Responsive reports now support vertical stacking. You can add multiple components to a column within a section. Learn more about creating responsive reports.
entry.summary: Responsive reports now support vertical stacking, allowing multiple components in a column.
entry.title: Feature: Vertical stacking

entry.content:
Double-click to resize chart margins

You can now double-click the chart boundaries of a time, a bar, a line, an area, or a scatter chart to reset the boundaries to their default settings.
entry.summary: Double-click chart boundaries to reset margins.
entry.title: Feature: Chart Margin Resizing

entry.content:
More data from Google Ads

You can visualize the following fields using the the Google Ads connector:

  • Conversions (by conv. date)
  • Conv. value (by conv. date)
  • All conv. (by conv. date)
  • All conv. value (by conv. date)
  • New vs. returning customers
  • Gross profit
  • Gross profit margin
entry.summary: You can now visualize more data from Google Ads, including conversions, conv. value, and customer metrics.
entry.title: Feature: New Google Ads Data

entry.content:
Table charts support up to 10 sort fields

Report editors can now configure up to 10 sort fields for table charts.

Learn more about configuring sort fields for table charts.
entry.summary: You can now add up to 10 sort fields to your table charts.
entry.title: Feature: Table charts support up to 10 sort fields

entry.content:
Looker connector enhancements

Looker data sources now display the names of fields without their prepended view names. Fields are now nested under their corresponding views.

Learn more about how Looker Explore data appears in Looker Studio.
entry.summary: We've enhanced the Looker connector for Looker Studio. Field names no longer include prepended view names and are now nested under their respective views for a cleaner data presentation.
entry.title: Feature: Looker Connector Improvements

entry.content:
User interface change: "Add quick filter" is now "Add filter"

We've made a wording change to the filter bar in the report editor. The button label that previously said "Add quick filter" is now "Add filter." The functionality of quick filters hasn't changed. Learn more about quick filters.
entry.summary: The button label
entry.title: Changed: Add filter button label changed

entry.content:
Partner connection launch update The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • Odoo Appointment AppiWorks by Jivrus Technologies. Sources: Odoo Appointments
  • Snowflake by Supermetrics. Sources: Snowflake
  • GA4 Annotations by ReallyGoodData. Sources: Google Analytics
  • 800.com Call Analytics by 800.com. Sources: 800com
  • TikTok Shop by Supermetrics. Sources: Tiktok Shop
  • seoClarity Keyword Details by seoClarity. Sources: Seoclarity
  • seoClarity Domain Summary by seoClarity. Sources: Seoclarity

The following partner connectors were released during the week of Sep 15, 2025:

  • Odoo Subscription AppiWorks by Jivrus Technologies. Sources: OdOo Subscription
  • Amazon DSP by Dataslayer. Sources: Amazon Ads
  • Etsy by Power My Analytics. Sources: Etsy
  • SeoSamba CRM by SeoSamba. Sources: Seosamba CRM
  • Google BigQuery by Supermetrics. Sources: Google BigQuery
  • Microsoft Ads by Porter Metrics. Sources: Microsoft Ads
  • Outbrain DSP by Catchr. Sources: Outbrain
  • The Trade Desk by Catchr. Sources: The Trade Desk
  • Close.com by Windsor.ai. Sources: Close
  • Odoo Invoice AppiWorks by Jivrus Technologies. Sources: Odoo Invoice
entry.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of several new partner connectors for Looker Studio. These new integrations include Odoo Appointment AppiWorks, Snowflake, GA4 Annotations, 800.com Call Analytics, TikTok Shop, seoClarity Keyword Details, and seoClarity Domain Summary. Additionally, several connectors were released this week, including Odoo Subscription AppiWorks, Amazon DSP, Etsy, SeoSamba CRM, Google BigQuery, Microsoft Ads, Outbrain DSP, The Trade Desk, Close.com, and Odoo Invoice AppiWorks. These additions expand the data sources available for analysis within Looker Studio.
entry.title: Announcement: New Partner Connectors Available

entry.content:
Looker Studio Explorer (beta) feature deprecation

The Looker Studio Explorer (beta) feature is being deprecated and will no longer be available.

NO ACTION is required. Existing explorations that were created with the Explorer will be converted to reports automatically.

Learn more about the deprecation timeline and details.
entry.summary: The Looker Studio Explorer (beta) feature will be deprecated and no longer available. No action is needed as existing explorations will be converted to reports automatically.
entry.title: Changed: Looker Studio Explorer (beta) is being deprecated

entry.content:
Hyperlinks and images are disabled for data sources that use Viewer's Credentials

When you enable Viewer's Credentials for a data source, Looker Studio won't render hyperlinks or images in dimensions from that data source.

This limitation does not apply if the report creator and the viewer are members of the same team workspace.
entry.summary: Hyperlinks and images are disabled for data sources using Viewer's Credentials, except when report creator and viewer share a team workspace.
entry.title: Breaking: Hyperlinks and Images Disabled with Viewer's Credentials

entry.content:
Treemap chart improvements

Improvements to Treemap charts include the following:

  • A new Fields section in the Setup tab that lets report editors specify a dimension or a metric to use as the basis for chart coloring
  • New color options that are based on the selection in the Fields section
  • A new Border radius setting that lets report editors control the border radius of tree branches
  • A new Label section in the Style tab
entry.summary: Explore the latest Treemap chart improvements, including new options for coloring, border styling, and label pengaturan. Customize your data visualization like never before.
entry.title: Feature: Treemap Chart Enhancements

entry.content:
[Pro feature] Number of scheduled reports increased to 200

You can create a maximum of 200 schedules per Looker Studio Pro report.
entry.summary: The number of scheduled reports you can create for each Looker Studio Pro report has been increased to 200.
entry.title: Changed: Scheduled reports increased to 200

entry.content:
Partner connection launch update

The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • HubSpot by Adzviser. Sources: Hubspot
  • Amazon Seller Central by Adzviser. Sources: Amazon
  • Amazon Ads by Adzviser. Sources: Amazon Ads
entry.summary: We
entry.title: Feature: New Partner Connectors Available in Looker Studio

entry.content:
Vertical stacking in responsive reports

Responsive reports now support vertical stacking. You can add multiple components to a column within a section.
entry.summary: Responsive reports now support vertical stacking, allowing multiple components within a column.
entry.title: Feature: Vertical Stacking

entry.content:
Sort table charts by up to 10 fields

Report creators can now set up to sort 10 fields for table charts, including fields that are not selected in the chart.

Learn more about sorting table charts.

NOTE: This feature was not released on 8/21, and will instead be included in a later release.
entry.summary: You can now sort table charts by up to 10 fields, even fields not included in the chart. This feature will be released soon.
entry.title: Feature: Sort table charts by up to 10 fields

entry.content:
Looker connector respects LookML value_format property

When you're using the Looker connector, value formats that you apply using the value_format LookML property will now be displayed in Looker Studio reports. You can view and edit the value format as usual.

Note that the syntax for conditional formatting using value_format is not supported in Looker Studio.
entry.summary: Looker connector now displays LookML value_format property.
entry.title: Feature: LookML Value Formatting in Looker Connector

entry.content:
Partner connection launch update

The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • Shopify by Master Metrics
  • Tienda Nube by Master Metrics
  • Google Merchant Center by Dataslayer
  • Google Keyword Planner by Dataslayer
  • Mangools SERPWatcher by Mangools.com
  • Pipedrive by Master Metrics
  • Facebook ads by Middly
  • Google Merchant Center by Windsor.ai
  • FB Page Data with AI by Picometrics
  • LinkedIn Ads with AI by Picometrics
  • 快客-GA4串接 by 黑客數位
  • seoClarity Keyword Tags by seoClarity
  • GA4 with AI insights by Picometrics
  • Tracktest Company Results by Tracktest s.r.o.
  • 快客-GAds 串接 by 黑客數位
  • Salesforce by Adzviser
entry.summary: New partner connectors are available in the Looker Studio Connector Gallery, including Shopify, Tienda Nube, Google Merchant Center, Google Keyword Planner, Mangools SERPWatcher, Pipedrive, Facebook ads, LinkedIn Ads, GA4 with AI insights, and more.
entry.title: Announcement: New Partner Connectors Available

entry.content:
Background colors for bar and column chart labels

You can now set a data-label background color for any bar-label-position option for column and bar charts.

Learn more about data labels for bar charts and column charts.
entry.summary: Background colors for bar and column chart labels.
entry.title: Feature: New feature: Background colors for chart labels

The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • 快客-Thread 社群洞察 by 黑客數位

entry.content:
Looker connector enhancements

Looker connector support for selected calculated field functions is now generally available.
entry.summary: Looker connector enhancements now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Looker connector enhancements

entry.content:
Conditional formatting in query result chips

You can now apply conditional formatting to change the background color and text color of query result chips.
entry.summary: Conditional formatting for query result chips.
entry.title: Feature: Feature Announcement

entry.content:
Data label improvements for waterfall charts

Report creators can now specify the position of data labels for waterfall charts along with the level of data label text contrast.

Learn more about waterfall chart data label options.
entry.summary: New options for waterfall chart data labels.
entry.title: Feature: Data label improvements for waterfall charts

entry.content:
Custom columns and custom dimensions in New Search Ads 360 Connector

The New Search Ads 360 connector now supports custom columns and custom dimensions. You can add any of your saved Search Ads 360 custom columns and custom dimensions to Looker Studio reports and join them with other fields in tables and charts.
entry.summary: New Search Ads 360 connector now supports custom columns and custom dimensions. Add saved custom columns and dimensions to Looker Studio reports.
entry.title: Feature: New Search Ads 360 Connector Update

entry.content:
Pro feature: The Code Interpreter is now available in Preview

The Code Interpreter in Conversational Analytics is available in Preview for Looker Studio Pro subscriptions. The Code Interpreter translates your natural language questions into Python code and executes that code to provide advanced analysis and visualizations. The Code Interpreter is disabled by default.
entry.summary: Code Interpreter now in Preview for Looker Studio Pro.
entry.title: Announcement: Code Interpreter Preview

entry.content:
New report canvas sizes

Two new preset canvas size options are available, letting you control the width and height of your report on the screen. The new options are size A4, available in portrait or landscape orientations.

Learn more about report and page layout options.
entry.summary: New preset canvas sizes for reports.
entry.title: Feature: Report Canvas Size Options

entry.content:
New alt text field for images

You can now add alt text to report images to make them accessible to screen readers. See the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) guidelines on alt text for more information about writing alt text.
entry.summary: New way to add alt text to images.
entry.title: Feature: Alt Text for Images

entry.content:
Looker connector enhancements

Additional calculated field functions are now available in Preview.
entry.summary: New functions for Looker connector.
entry.title: Feature: Looker connector enhancements

entry.content:
Performance improvement for BigQuery data sources

Report viewers may notice improved performance when the report uses a BigQuery data source.

The BigQuery connector supports short query optimized mode. In this mode, when BigQuery determines it can finish a query quickly, BigQuery prioritizes returning immediate results instead of creating a BigQuery job. Short query optimized mode may apply in the following situations:

  • When the data source uses Viewer's Credentials
  • When the data source uses Owner's Credentials but you are not the credential owner.

There is no change in user experience or report behavior for data source credential owners.
entry.summary: Performance improvements for BigQuery data sources.
entry.title: Feature: BigQuery Performance Boost

entry.content:
Highlight charts by filter

The Applied Filters panel now lets you click on a filter to highlight all charts that the filter applies to.
entry.summary: Highlight charts by filter
entry.title: Feature: Highlight charts by filter

entry.content:
Add descriptions to reports

You can now add text descriptions to a report. The report search now matches the report title as well as the description.
entry.summary: Add descriptions to reports. Search matches report title and description.
entry.title: Feature: New feature: Report descriptions

entry.content:
Partner connection launch update

The following partner connectors have been added to the Looker Studio Connector Gallery:

  • Google Ads by Detrics
  • Facebook Insights by Master Metrics
  • Instagram Insights by Master Metrics
  • Youtube by Master Metrics
  • Google Ads by Master Metrics
  • Google Analytics 4 by Master Metrics
  • Dashbo by Dashbo
  • Odoo Sign AppiWorks by Jivrus Technologies
  • 快客-GSC 串接 by 黑客數位
  • IntelliKid Systems by IntelliKid Systems LLC
  • Odoo POS AppiWorks by Jivrus Technologies
  • Google PageSpeed Insights by Supermetrics
entry.summary: New partner connectors are available in the Looker Studio Connector Gallery.
entry.title: Announcement: Partner Connections Update

entry.content:
Report abuse

Looker Studio report viewers can now report abusive content. Content is automatically reviewed, and content that is reported as abusive is hidden or deleted.
entry.summary: Users can now report abusive content in Looker Studio. Reported content undergoes automatic review and is either hidden or deleted.
entry.title: Feature: Report abuse in Looker Studio

entry.content:
Performance improvement for BigQuery data sources

Note: This feature has been delayed and is currently not available. (Release note updated on July 21, 2025.)

Report viewers may notice improved performance when the report uses a BigQuery data source.

The BigQuery connector supports short query optimized mode. In this mode, when BigQuery determines that it can finish a query quickly, BigQuery prioritizes returning immediate results instead of creating a BigQuery job. Short query optimized mode may apply in the following situations:

  • When the data source uses Viewer's Credentials
  • When the data source uses Owner's Credentials but you are not the credential owner

There is no change in user experience or report behavior for data source credential owners.
entry.summary: BigQuery data sources now offer enhanced performance, prioritizing faster query completion when possible. This improvement is particularly noticeable when using Viewer's Credentials or when the report owner is not the credential owner. The feature
entry.title: Feature: Performance improvements for BigQuery data sources

entry.content:
New alignment option for Cartesian charts

The new Align with grid setting lets you set the alignment of the chart legend with the position of the chart grid, instead of aligning with the chart title.

This setting is available for Cartesian charts in reports that have modern charts enabled.
entry.summary: Align your chart legends with the chart grid using the new 'Align with grid' setting. This option provides better visual consistency for Cartesian charts in reports with modern charts enabled.
entry.title: Feature: Align chart legends with grid

entry.content:
Don't display data in comparison metrics when Group others is enabled

The Group others option could display incorrect data when used with comparison metrics. Comparison metric fields now display the string no data when the Group others option is enabled on a chart.
entry.summary: When the 'Group others' option is enabled on a chart, comparison metric fields will now display 'no data' to prevent the display of inaccurate data.
entry.title: Breaking: Group others option update

entry.content:
Looker connector enhancements

The Looker connector can now connect to a private IP (private services access) only Looker (Google Cloud core) instance or to a private IP (Private Service Connect) Looker (Google Cloud core) instance using the Looker instance ID.
entry.summary: You can now connect to private IP Looker instances (Private Service Connect or Private Services Access) using the Looker instance ID.
entry.title: Feature: Looker connector enhancements

entry.content:
Updates to Assets: search API endpoint

The Assets: search API endpoint now includes a previousPageToken attribute in its response. This token allows API users to paginate forwards and backwards through the result set.
entry.summary: The Assets: search API endpoint has been updated to include a previousPageToken, enabling easier navigation through search results.
entry.title: Feature: API endpoint now supports backward pagination

entry.content:
Pro feature: Gemini in Looker is enabled by default

For Looker Studio Pro subscriptions that are created on or after June 3, 2025, Gemini in Looker is enabled automatically. Looker Studio users with the appropriate permissions can manage enablement on the Gemini in Looker page under User Settings.
entry.summary: Gemini in Looker is now enabled by default for new Looker Studio Pro subscriptions starting June 3, 2025. Users with the correct permissions can manage this feature through User Settings.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini in Looker enabled for new Pro subscriptions

entry.content:
Pro feature: Code Interpreter is enabled by default

The Code Interpreter for Conversational Analytics is now enabled by default when the Gemini in Looker and Trusted Tester features settings are enabled for the Google Cloud project that is associated with a Looker Studio Pro subscription. The Code Interpreter in Conversational Analytics is a Preview feature that translates your natural language questions into Python code and executes that code to provide advanced analysis and visualizations.

Looker Studio users with the appropriate permissions can manage enablement on the Gemini in Looker page under User Settings.
entry.summary: The Code Interpreter feature for Conversational Analytics is now enabled by default for Looker Studio Pro users when specific Gemini and Trusted Tester settings are active. This feature allows natural language questions to be converted into Python code for advanced data analysis and visualizations.
entry.title: Feature: Code Interpreter Now Enabled by Default
